AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.description: I am a technology enthusiast, a 23 year old young man who brings with him a passion for innovation and through the world of software and hardware development. I am determined to pursue a career in this dynamic field, driven by an insatiable curiosity and a desire to learn continuous.

EmailSection.description: I am currently looking for new opportunities, my communication channels will always be available if you want to get in touch. If you have any questions about me or just want to chat professionally, I'm happy to answer them!

HeroSection.description: Captivated by the world of technology for a few years, my main objective is to use lines of code to develop tangible solutions to complex problems.
